reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Long weekend in Montpelleier to watch Sale Sharks v Montpelleir in the Heineken Cup. Did everything we neede it to. Very helpful friendly front desk staff, clean modern comfortable and 10 mins walk ofrom the Place Du Comadie so none of the late night noise that you would get there.
reviews.title: Ideal for the weekend rugby trip

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Ideal
reviews.title: A few minutes walking from old town

reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel for two nights at the end of September. We booked the room through an internet wholesaler for a much reduced price when compared to either the hotel’s own website or walk in prices. The hotel is located a couple of minutes from the Leon Blum tramway stop. It is within walking distance to Antigone, Galeries Lafayette and the old city. It is also near the river pathways for a nice walk. Restaurants are also quite nearby. The hotel staff was uniformly friendly and helpful. Check in was quick and easy. Our room, though small, was of average size for a room in France. It was well appointed with a comfortable bed. The pillows though were too firm for us. The bathroom was large enough with an excellent shower. The room was very clean and in good order. The hotel offers free WiFi in the rooms. We decided the breakfast was too expensive - €20 for the two of us. Instead we bought croissants and coffee from the nearby market.
reviews.title: 2 Days/One Night in Montpellier

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We recommend this hotel for it price, location, pleasant staff and good accommodation. Montpellier is a lovely town well worth visiting and this hotel will serve you well.
reviews.title: Very good modern hotel with friendly, helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I found this hotel last minute, it was the only one available during the week for whatever reason. Thus, I thought I was going to be in trouble. It turned out to be just the opposite! The location was great too, the nearby tram stops allow access to everything in the city and beyond. The hotel itself was a beauty! The room (and bathroom) was nice, spacious, and clean. The staff was ever so friendly, including those who work in the breakfast buffet! They were very accommodating, each and every one of them! Whenever I plan to visit Montpellier again, I will definitely be looking to stay at the Kyriad!
reviews.title: Great hotel in Montpellier
Exceptional!
reviews.text: Wonderful stay in a quiet part of town with all the sights and sites a shortish walk or a tramway ride away. The staff, as everyone says, are unfailingly excellent. The hotel is clean and modern throughout, the breakfast has a good choice of cold food in the usual buffet style. There is no reason to pass this hotel over, unless you can't do without bacon, eggs and sausage!
The room is clean and in very good condition, with a comfy bed. The breakfast was great. The staff was very friendly and helpful. Easy to arrive in the city center by tram. Great stay!
reviews.title: Great stay!

reviews.text: Stayed in this hotel on March 16, 2012. The rooms are small but very clean as is the toilet. The staff were very friendly and helpful and the location is close to the city centre. Would readily stay here again. If anyone is looking for a restaurant near by, I would try Raphael. They had excellent food, the chef is from Lyon and the owner from Paris. The service there was also exceptional.
reviews.title: Lovely hotel and very friendly and helpful staff

reviews.text: We stayed here for a rugby weekend in November 2011. We were a group of three, sharing two rooms in the hotel.
reviews.title: Great for a weekend break

reviews.text: Each room had a large, spacious bathroom, and for the price, the hotel had large, well appointed rooms.
reviews.title: very good

reviews.text: What a breath of fresh air, the desk staff were excellent with a genuine willingness to help. We were a group of 'mamils' on a cycling trip. Nothing was too much trouble and all questions were happily answered. The rooms were spotlessly clean. Kathleen in the dining room was so helpful and looked after us so well. It was a very pleasant stay and i would have no hesitation in recommending this hotel. It is a little bit of a walk to the center but not a drag. Parking in the hotel garage is also a plus. I would return without hesitation.
reviews.title: A gem

reviews.text: Hotel room is reasonable. Location is pretty good and at walking distance to the center. Privare car parking is a plus for motorists. We had two rooms and experienced no problem.
reviews.title: Reasonable

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Arriving in Montpellier by car during rush hour without gsm and without knowing the place can be a tough job. Asking directions in another hotel finally solved the problem, and fortunately the friendly Kyriad front desk attendant found an empty spot in their garage. Parking in the street in front of the hotel is not possible.
reviews.title: OK if you can find it

reviews.text: Nothing to complain about as far as bed/bathroom is concerned: both adequate in size, decently equipped and very clean. We were at the back, overlooking a large patio, so no nighttime noise. The street in front of the hotel -more like a motorway- has a lot of speeding traffic, so beware!
reviews.title: quiet area with helpful staff
Almost perfect hosting, location and very friendly staff
reviews.text: Our main problem here: no restaurant. Arriving in the evening: not even a snack or sandwich.
Clean, no-nonsense hotel situation close to the city center in Montpellier. Staff were helpful and spoke english. Good value for money.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We only stayed here one night but the staff were really helpful and friendly. It was located close to everything. Rooms were tiny but clean and had everything we needed.
reviews.title: Clean no frills hotel in good location with great staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A good location near the centre of town. Very convenient for public transport. We parked outside on a meter as we were only staying for 1 night. Parking is limited to 2 hours on the metre and we arrived after metre hours. The hotel has parking but there was post barring the entrance when arrived. Bedrooms looked like they were recently decorated but small. The bathroom had only a shower. The free WIFI worked well in public areas but not so well in the room. Tea and coffee facilities were provided in the room.
reviews.title: Well situated

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The staff were very helpful and friendly and spoke good English.
reviews.title: Very close to the bus stop for the airport. Good hotel for a quick stopover

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A reasonable chain hotel.
reviews.title: Nice practical well situated hotel
